etopAccountType.description: Indicates whether given account is **etop**, **shop** or **partner**.

etopUser.description: Represents a user in eTop system. The user may or may not have associated accounts.

customer.description:
If order_source is self, customer must be shop information
and customer_address, shipping_address must be shop address.

shop_address.description:
If there are products from shop, this field should be set.
Otherwise, use shop default address.

orderPublicFulfillment.title: Public API for using with ManyChat
